title: Amazing Fables: A Tale of Escape
description: This story focuses on a young adult struggling with despair, loneliness, loss and hopelessness and how an unexpected path to escape comes along. Guide by a trusted sidekick, Pandora, who symbolises hope, the hero goes on a journey to find the different lessons in life.Customizable via Amazing Fables website, it is really a unique gift for any of your loved ones.
author: Warren Leow
